text: I have been a devoted Target shopper for years, but my money will go elsewhere until you grow a spine/conscience.
in what way?
watch the news
that's right Kerri!!!
same!
yeassss

right with you

why do you care who they hire?
Kerri Dwyer yes...me too
me, too!
me too. I’m sad but it’s the right thing to do.
mine too.
same here
I feel the same.
where tho?
Costco
i can’t get everything at Costco tho
On average, I spend 400+/month at Target, but no more. All of my money will go elsewhere due to their rollback of DEI.
Target will definitely get more business now that they have made rational decisions. There is more of us then you!
Doesn't look like it.
I’m with you.
Same! I really enjoyed shopping at Costco today!
Same
I didn’t shop at Target very often, but now I’m placing several orders a day

We buy EVERYTHING from Target. I mean EVERYTHING. So, changing to more intentionally equitable and inclusive shopping will be hard, but we’re doing it and I see we’re not alone. Target, I never thought it would be YOU.
this!
im confused. What exactly is target doing/not doing?
they scaled back DEI quotas. They’re going to hire based on qualifications.
they should hire by qualificatiions. Would u hire a plumber if they didn't know what they were doing?
Ok , where is everyone shopping since it's not Target or Walmart anymore? I love Costco but where else?
Target has sought to eliminate their DEI policy. Feels weird to me since they just showcased African American Designers but it’s their corporate decision from what I’ve read online
read
local places. TJ Maxx. JC Penney.

home Goods!
I see plenty of people of color ads. This is silly.

try Nordstrom.

It’s okay 
 Bye. I didn’t shop at Target very often, but now I’m placing several orders a day

don’t be sorry. You’re a good human.

o lado direita

obg por me responder

. Great, it will be less crowed for me to shop. Too many cool 
 things there.

same!!
good for you

Just added up my 2024 spending at Target - it was $10,200! Not shopping at Target for the last month feels so good! It’s been refreshing to not only shop at Costco, but also with my local markets and shops.
Cut up my redcard today, because nothing says love thy neighbor like giving up a hateful corporation for Lent!
Target, you were my favorite store for years, but I couldn't sleep well if I continued to shop with you knowing the things and people I care about no longer matter to you.

It warms my heart that in the midst of this craziness, there ARE people showing up for marginalized communities. I mimic many other posts, Target was my go to due to celebrating ALL people and I cannot in good conscience buy a single thing from them anymore. Very disheartening Target. Shame on you.
Are you also against the universities that are dropping DEI?
fir what specifically
Nope. Hard pass Target.
I will continue to support Target. They treat their employees very well, their prices are very competitive and their customer service is great.

I agree 
!! Target is one of the best stores to get everything. Everyone says they now got to Costco 
 first of all Target is better and more diverse products , secondly bulk purchases will definitely break the bank and get old real quick.
I will too. I will shop Target and drink Coke. Their customer service is top notch. I haven’t read anything from their employees complaining, have you?
I have friends that work there are they are treated very well. That should be what’s important.
exactly! The most qualified employees and they’re treated well. That’s what’s important, not some hiring quota.
that's not what DEI is btw
tag them if not your lying
and they aren’t inclusive and bow to the oligarchs
some of us have compassion though and understand DEI
Of course you will Mein Herr.

Oof, not a good move, Target. I think a lot of us are feeling like things are changing fast and out of our control. Spending our money where we can support inclusivity is something we can do. I don’t see how alienating a lot of your customer base was smart?

I needed new bedding for my daughter's room - historically, this would have been a Target run. However, we bought a few days ago from another company that did not choose to roll back their DEI policies. I already sleep better at night knowing that my hard-earned dollars are supporting businesses that align with my deeply-held values.
Target was my favorite store and I’ve DROPPED IT like you dropped DEI initiatives. My family of 8 will be shopping elsewhere.
Bedding essential: having a clear conscience. It’s more soothing than any thread count.
I love target
I love Target!
So do I!
me too. I’ll always shop there.
Target is still here?? Get in the car everyone..we’re going to COSTCO.
Costco for the win!!
DEI, never shopping at Target again
Target every week plus waiting on my delivery today.
good job! I don't this also
Costco
On my way, awesome selections!
I will continue to support Target. They treat their employees very well, their prices are very competitive and their customer service is great.
That’s right! Put them right up there with Amazon! They’re now on the “ No Buy List”!

Oh how I miss you Target 
 You missed the mark
I used to love Target but will now be taking my business elsewhere
Will never get another dime from me
Yesterday, went 25 minutes out of my way to buy some needed baby clothes for my grandson, rather than go to the closest Target. Most rewarding $50.00 I ever spent.
I shopped in my local Target 2-3 times per week. In the past month I haven’t been there once!
Your diverse customer base now knows your true colors.
Shopping elsewhere.
Costco from now on for me!
Costco it is!
Target I was in your store at least twice a week. But you played in our faces. You switched up so fast which suggests, you are a fake. Well, switch up is a two way street. So, disappointed in you.
After many, many years shopping at Target I’m taking my business elsewhere. You have caved to the anti- DEI king.
Kirkland products are replacing the Up and Up brand throughout our house
I don't understand, I never thought Target was such a great store. Plenty of other places to shop.
I sleep better when I spend my money at stores committed to DEI.
Costco has nice bedding without throwing DEI employees under the bus.

google it. Target is unethical
exactly. Screw Target.

are you target?

 Bye. I didn’t shop at Target very often, but now I’m placing several orders a day

Target is right next to the baseball stadium my son had practice at last evening. I needed some items so I drove 15 minutes away to the store that is owned by Kroger, even though Target is less than a minute away from where he was practicing. I’m spending my hard earned money elsewhere. Bye Target.
Nope. No more. Spent almost $400 at Costco yesterday. Much of that would have been at Target. You lose.
don’t like Costco. They nothing like Target.
that’s precisely the point: Costco is nothing like Target. That’s why Costco will thrive and Target will tank. As it should be.
I love Target! Will keep shopping there! My Granddaughter loves Target

Good time to teach your granddaughter what values and integrity mean.
I don't need to my daughter does! I'll shop wherever I want.
Can't afford Costco!
yea you do the same
you do same with your kids!
what does my morals my daughters morals have to do with shopping at Target!
Can’t teach what you don’t know.
Costco is way cheaper than Target
I like Target's products, but its policies foster exclusion and prejudice.
prejudice?
baloney
how so, be specific
Check your facts.
same! We go at least 3x a week
the choice is yours. I am curious that you posted the Statue of Liberty. What are your thoughts on “give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses…”
it's unfortunate that you're willing to sacrifice your daughter's future rights for the "convenience", if that's even a possibility of shopping at targhetto.

I used to love Target. The last several years, my husband and I have spent $1200 on Target gift cards for Christmas gifts for the kids and grandkids, and again for birthdays, in addition to shopping there at least 1-2 times per week. We spent many thousands at Target every year. No more. I will be taking my business to Costco.
YOU SOLD OUT!!
Refuse to shop at Target.
Sorry, better places to shop where they recognize each person’s humanity and worth
I will continue to support Target. They treat their employees very well, their prices are very competitive and their customer service is great. By the way, how has been your day?
It makes me sad, but I can't in good conscience shop at Target any more.
Carla Coffman. Why?
I'll be back when you recommit to DEI.
Not from Target. You back out of DEI I stay out of target
I'm shopping at Costco because they value ALL PEOPLE
to those who ask where to get stuff. Try #becomingMinimalist get your necessities aka food from local grocery stores
TBH- I’m doing ok without you, Target. Integrity feels better than impulse buying, I guess
I don’t think so. Not spending one cent in your store again after your recent changes to your DEI initiatives.
Always been a Target shopper, not many other choices in our area!
Spent so much money yesterday getting new sheets for all bedrooms! Love Target!!
Went shopping Tuesday with my toddler like we do every Tuesday, looking forward to going there today .. again
Used to like target. May never step foot in there again. I can't believe they don't have the backbone to stand up for people.
Not spending my dollars at Target anymore
Good morning - just LOVE the Easter cards I purchased yesterday and you had the latest book from my favorite author on sale. Ran in to get your great MacnCheese - forgot how much I loved Target.
Bye bye Target…used to love you but…

It’s just me and my husband and I eat like a bird. Getting bulk food at Costco is such a waste of money and food for us. Also food is super expensive right now and I’m not wasting money paying twice as much at a grocery store for what I could get at Target for less. Economically for me it makes zero sense. And I’m glad y’all have extra money to pay for it all.
I'm a family of one plus pets. I bought a freezer and do food prep. I save way more! I sleep better and eat better.
I have been away for a few years...time to go back!
Costco.
I’m sure Target will survive just fine. Gotta go submit my shopping order now.

No DEI, no Target. And I love this store but giving you my money knowing you took away DEI initiatives just doesn’t sit well with me and those who continue to support them shows how you feel about others that are different from you. Basically that they don’t matter. Shame on you.
Target… are you listening?
My kid is going to college this fall. I have a good budget to make his dorm room very comfortable for him. I won’t be spending a single dollar of that budget in your store.
Those sheets from Costco tho
Is it getting lonely in your stores without DEI?!?
I get a good night sleep with Threshold linens, they are my fav! Love everything at Target. You are my go to store.
